body.name: LK 3 Pack for Samsung Galaxy S20 Plus Screen Protector [Not Glass] [Support Fingerprint Unlock] Bubble Free, with Easy Installation Tool, 3D Curved Max Coverage for S20 Plus 6.7-inch
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 39 mins
features: 【Compatible & Cost-effective】LK Samsung Galaxy S20 Plus Screen Protector is specially designed for Samsung Galaxy S20 Plus. The Package comes with Galaxy S20 Plus Screen Protector and full accessories for installation.

【Flexible Materials & Maximum Protection】Please Note: The screen protector is not tempered glass, it is made of TPU that can cover the curved edges of the Samsung S20 Plus, providing maximum protection against scratches. With nano-elastic to prevent your Samsung Galaxy S20 Plus screen breakage caused by drops.

【High Definition & Smooth Touch】With 98% High Transparency and Ultra-thin Design, S20 Plus Screen Protector brings bright and colorful image quality, keeping an original visual experience for you. High-response Haptic Touch Technology supports Fingerprint Unlock, ensuring quick app launching. You can enjoy the original touch of the Galaxy S20 Plus screen.

【3D Full Cover & Scratch Resistant】The screen protector is not tempered glass, it is made of TPU that can cover the curved edges of the S20 Plus, providing maximum protection against scratches. If have small bubbles or scratches after the screen protector is installed, the scratch can be repaired automatically.

【Lifetime Service】 We always aim at providing excellent products & service to customers. If you have any questions before or after your purchase, please feel free to contact us, we will reply to you within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lifetime warranty! Easy install, great results.
reviews.reviewText: Best installation, video was amazingly helpful. Lifetime warranty! Can't beat that. It is not tempered glass, it's a film that protects the screen. Fit over curves perfect and came with 3 total.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works like a charm
reviews.reviewText: I have on of these on another phone. My 20+ had the "tempered glass" protector that has had continuous problem with touchscreen/tap and fingerprint. It seemed to get unstuck and had to tap harder for anything to work. I finally got this non-glass TPU protector. It was so easy to install. I got it to install bubble-free. Everything works great just like it was on the original screen. As 20+ has the curve and I have a case, this screen protector works as expected.The package comes with 3 screens and a camera lens screen. It has all the install accessories and a link to the instruction video. There is a tiny gap at the curve edges but that helps with the external phone case. I am very happy with the install. Very durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this after running into problems with a glass screen protector that seemed not to adhere to the screen of my phone; it felt loose despite following installation instructions & made it difficult to use the phone. This product works really well! The installation video was extremely helpful so it was a breeze to install. I appreciate the 2 additional protectors that came in the package. I definitely recommend this product & would buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Best cover I've bought so far!
reviews.reviewText: I am hard on my phones (specially the screens) I've had this screen protector for a couple weeks now and so far it's been great!ProsEasy to installDoesn't lift off the curved edgesHolds up to scratches (so far)Touch response works greatNo fingerprint issues.ConsFunny smell (like when your getting ur nails done smell)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it
reviews.reviewText: Very good quality, and very eary instructions on how to put the screen protector. This package came with stickers 😍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value for a nice product
reviews.reviewText: I prefer a non-glass (I. E. Soft plastic) screen protector vs a glass protector.Understanding that it might be less protection for cracks in your screen, it does still give you good protection from scratches, coins in the same pocket against screen, etc.I'm pleased that it came with multiple protectors. I'm known to not read directions carefully and that being said had I watched the video more closely, it may have shown me to use the provided straight edge to smooth out the air bubbles from the screen as I was laying the protector on to the screen.My first attempt did not go well and left many bubbles that would not come out.I un-installed and reinstalled a fresh cover and it came out much improved.There was still a small speck under the cover, but not enough to ever be noticed again.Recommended purchase. Good product for the right price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product comes with the best install kit I have ever used! No bubbles or taking it on and off to realign the screen protector. It came out perfect the first install after watching their video.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install following instructions. The quality is good
